title: 0   -1 Plague Inc - Evolved_v0.6_[RUS+ENG] {2bUnique}
description:
Overview: Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation from developer Ndemic Creations and brought to you on Android by Miniclip.


Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself. 

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for mobile, Plague Inc. evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive! 

A global hit with over 70 thousand 5 star ratings from around the world and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro.

Features: 
Ã¢Å“â€œStunning graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed) 
Ã¢Å“â€œHighly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management) 
Ã¢Å“â€œComprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful) 
Ã¢Å“â€œ10 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (10 Monkeys?) 
Ã¢Å“â€œFull Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!) 

Ã¢Å“â€œ50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve, thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved) 
Ã¢Å“â€œScoreboards and achievements to track the epidemic

Localised in English or Russian (more languages coming soon!) 

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references!

What's in this version:
Plague Inc Mutation Warning 1.4 - The Neurax Worm
- Enslave mankind with the new Neurax Worm expansion pack - a unique organism that can mind control humans! All new gameplay, strategy, graphics, music, events and more
- Genes can be removed for an extra challenge


What's New
Plague Inc. Mutation 6 warning Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Speed Runs & the CDC
-Speed Runs - How quickly can you kill the world?
-CDC content - The CDC asked me to meet them and talk about the models of infection in Plague Inc. The CDC now appears inside the game!
-Rebalanced the NAZG achievement for all the rabid fans out there:P
-Lots of new events and news, including a new Necroa Virus origin story
-Other performance and game improvements
-All progress/unlocks are kept when updating - saves will not work though

MOD Version Features: 
The first run of the game opens up the full version (insert genes, accelerating time to time mode, scripts, Zombie virus and Neuro-worm off advertising);
Integrated free purchases from Twingo (taken from this mod, use for its intended purpose is not required);
To open all that is available, press the settings button on the Restore purchase (taken from this mod to use for its intended purpose is not required);

This game has NO advertisements 

Instructions:

Select which language folder you want English or Russian and click the game icon. Enjoy!
